channel.title: ABC15 Arizona | Phoenix AZ | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/ABC15

item.title: Mass deportations "would have devastating consequences for t
item.description: Mass deportations "would have devastating consequences for the Phoenix area. We would see tens of thousands of kids not show up for school. We would see a major decrease in economic activity," Jose Patino, the Vice President of Aliento, said.

item.title: Is it raining in your area this morning?

item.title: "There was no sign of tampering," one buyer said. "No sign."
